name: azure-relay-tunnel-ts
description: Azure Relay Hybrid Connection Tunneling Utility (TypeScript/Node.js)

scripts.pkg: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js --output ./bin/RelayTunnelUsingHybridConnection --icon AzureRelayTunnelUtilityIcon.ico 2>nul
scripts.pkg:all: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64,node18-macos-x64 --output ./bin/RelayTunnelUsingHybridConnection --icon AzureRelayTunnelUtilityIcon.ico 2>nul && copy .env.template bin\.env.template
scripts.pkg:win: npm run build:release && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output ./bin/RelayTunnelUsingHybridConnection --icon AzureRelayTunnelUtilityIcon.ico 2>nul && copy .env.template bin\.env.template
scripts.pkg:linux: npm run build:release && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output ./bin/RelayTunnelUsingHybridConnection && cp .env.template bin/.env.template
scripts.pkg:macos: npm run build:release && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --output ./bin/RelayTunnelUsingHybridConnection --icon AzureRelayTunnelUtilityIcon.ico && cp .env.template bin/.env.template
